forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, the air is marked by a gentle coolness, a reminder of the city's oceanic embrace. The forecast speaks of a partly cloudy night, with temperatures dipping to a comfortable low, framing an inviting yet slightly brisk ambience. Winds from the southwest whisper through the streets at low speeds, occasionally dancing into more spirited gusts. As night deepens, the familiar marine layer may loom softly along the horizon, though it holds off an embrace of fog for now.

The daylight ahead promises a sun-kissed Saturday, illuminating the hills and imparting warmth, with temperatures slightly cooling into the afternoon. It is a day to venture out, perhaps to explore the lesser-known paths of Presidio or to stroll through the vibrant empires of craft and cuisine in the Mission. Light layers will serve well against the cool ocean breezes that can suddenly sweep through even the sunniest of spots. A casual walk, a visit to a local art gallery, or even a quiet reading session in Dolores Park under the warm Sun could reveal the heart of a vibrant city easing into a relaxed weekend. The evening holds a simple beauty, inviting you to soak in the atmosphere, whether it be at an outdoor café or along the waterfront, under the intricate dance of twilight.
